1461390.name: Night Society
1461390.description:
Night Society is a card based dungeon crawler where reckless teenagers with supernatural powers confront paranormal horrors in a town on the edge of collapse.

The town is changing, floods and other disasters are happening. Only the Odd Kids can stop what is coming.

Key Features

• Tactical card based combat
Build your deck and make strategic decisions in turn based encounters where positioning, timing, and synergies are key to survival.

• Run based progression and unlockables
Each run allows you to unlock new weapons, items, and playable characters, permanently expanding your options and opening new mechanics.

• Diverse playstyles and synergies
Combine characters, cards, and items to create powerful synergies and adapt your playstyle to your strategy and personal preferences.

• Playable characters with unique abilities
Every character brings distinct powers and mechanics that change how you approach combat and exploration.

• Story driven experience
Uncover the mystery behind the supernatural events through narrative encounters, choices, and environmental storytelling.

• Stylized noir grunge art direction
A distinctive visual style inspired by eighties and nineties nostalgia, blending dark horror with punk irreverence.

• Dark paranormal tone with sharp humor
Terrifying events coexist with irreverent humor, creating a flexible atmosphere where horror and personality collide.

Face the unknown.
Build your strategy.
Stop the nightmare before it consumes the town.
